attributes.action: David Cameron to press Saudi authorities on release of Karl Andree.
attributes.additional_details: FCO have full details of Karl Andree's case.
attributes.background: Karl Andree, a 74 year old UK citizen has been imprisoned for the last year in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia for being sentenced to 'gifting' and 'possession' of alcohol.   He was sentenced to a year in prison and 350 lashings.   He should of been released in August.
